entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, a dark wizard who seeks to possess Harry Potter.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, who is trying to protect Harry from Voldemort's influence.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, a young wizard who is being targeted by Voldemort.

relationships.description: Voldemort seeks to possess Harry Potter.
Dumbledore is trying to protect Harry from Voldemort's influence.
